title: Issue Campus-Wide Emergency Alert
description: Campus administration has decided to close the campus due to a severe weather event and needs to send an emergency alert.

tasks.description: Draft the emergency alert message based on the information provided by the administration.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent drafts a clear and concise message: 'Campus is closed effective immediately due to severe weather. All classes are cancelled.'

tasks.description: Select all communication channels for the alert (SMS, Email, Social Media).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly selects all available channels in the alert system.

tasks.description: Broadcast the emergency alert through the mass notification system.
